text: «Ni mɔɔ do ka a mɔɔɲɔɔ madimin kaba la wala a bolo la sɔsɔli rɔ, ka a kɛ sababu ri a mɔɔɲɔɔ wo lani ri to a la lafen kan ka mɛn, ai kana ko kɛ wo tii la fɔlɔ, fɔɔ ka makɔnɔni kɛ. Kɔ fɛ, ni madiminbatɔ ka gbeleke ta ka i wuli ka taama damira lu ma, a gbasila kana jalaki butun. Kɔni madiminbatɔ la baara lalɔ mɛn kɛra, a gbasila ye wodi bɔ ka wo sara madiminbatɔ yɛ. Ka a la wo kan, a ye a janto madiminbatɔ rɔ haan a wa kɛndɛya fewu.
